description: Polyfill implementation for MutationObserver and WeakMap, providing support for these APIs in environments lacking native support.

classes.name: JsMutationObserver
classes.description: A polyfill class for MutationObserver, providing DOM mutation observation capabilities.

classes.name: Registration
classes.description: Internal class managing individual mutation observer registrations.

methods.name: observe
methods.description: Start observing a target node for specified mutations.

methods.name: takeRecords
methods.description: Retrieve a list of mutation records.
